articles.title: India vs South Africa: KL Rahul Surpasses Virender Sehwag, Second Behind Sunil Gavaskar In Elite Lis.. - NDTVSports.com
articles.description: India vs South Africa: The century was KL Rahul's 5th outside Asia, which is one more than what Sehwag achieved in his career. He is now second on the list of Indian openers with most Test tons outside Asia.
